questions.question: What is your company name?
questions.description: Used in document header and metadata

questions.question: What is the name of your product or service?
questions.description: Used throughout the playbook to reference your offering

questions.question: Which sales model best describes your go-to-market approach?
questions.description: Determines the sales methodology and process steps

questions.question: Who owns this sales playbook?
questions.description: Person responsible for maintaining and updating the playbook

questions.question: What version number is this playbook?
questions.description: Version tracking for updates and revisions

questions.question: When was this playbook last updated?
questions.description: Date of the most recent revision

questions.question: Provide a brief summary of your product and the problem it solves
questions.placeholder: Our platform helps sales teams automate repetitive tasks, track customer interactions, and close deals faster by providing a unified CRM with AI-powered insights.
questions.description: High-level product description for sales team understanding

questions.question: What is the core benefit delivered to customers?
questions.placeholder: Increase sales productivity by 40% while reducing manual data entry and improving forecast accuracy
questions.description: Primary value customers receive from your product

questions.question: List the major features or modules of your product
questions.placeholder: AI-powered lead scoring, automated email sequences, pipeline visualization, mobile app, integrations with 50+ tools
questions.description: Key capabilities that sales team should highlight

questions.question: What are your key differentiators versus competitors?
questions.placeholder: Only CRM with built-in AI coaching, fastest implementation time (2 weeks), native mobile experience, 99.9% uptime guarantee
questions.description: Unique selling points for competitive situations

questions.question: Which pricing model best describes your offering?
questions.description: How customers pay for your product

questions.question: Which industries do you primarily target?
questions.description: Primary industry verticals for your sales team to focus on

questions.question: What size companies are your ideal customers?
questions.description: Target company size for sales qualification

questions.question: Who are the typical decision makers and influencers?
questions.placeholder: VP Sales (decision maker), Sales Operations (influencer), CFO (budget approver)
questions.description: Key personas involved in the buying process

questions.question: What problems does your product solve for customers?
questions.placeholder: Manual data entry, lack of pipeline visibility, inaccurate forecasting, poor lead conversion
questions.description: Pain points sales team should uncover during discovery

questions.question: What events typically trigger customers to purchase?
questions.placeholder: New fiscal year, rapid growth, missed revenue targets, new leadership, system migration
questions.description: Events that create urgency for purchase decisions

questions.question: Define your sales stages
questions.description: Each stage of your sales process with objectives, exit criteria, and responsible team member

questions.question: What are your key qualification criteria?
questions.description: Framework for qualifying opportunities (e.g., BANT, MEDDICC, CHAMP)

questions.question: What common customer problems should sales address?
questions.description: Map customer pain points to your solution messaging

questions.question: What objections do prospects typically raise?
questions.description: Common objections and how to handle them effectively

questions.question: What tools and resources does your sales team use?
questions.description: Tools that support the sales process (CRM, demo tools, etc.)

questions.question: What metrics and KPIs should sales track?
questions.description: Key performance indicators for measuring sales success

questions.question: What steps occur when transitioning from sales to customer success?
questions.description: Process for ensuring smooth customer onboarding after deal closure
